Diva (Dragon/SP-L) 106
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Passwords List: Dragon: Diva (Dragon/SP-L) 106
The instructions for unlocking this breed are available in the Shrine Topics Section of the MRA2 Archive.
By Gizmo the Lemur on Saturday, November 30, 2002 - 09:12 pm:

LST_DRG

Just enter the Emperor Cup after you beat the game again, and Ayase will give you the password via letter from AGIMA. The MRA2 Diva doesn't have the amazing stats the mra1 Diva had, but its appearance kinda makes up for it (It looks different from the other Dragons as the Pixie coach Morgan looks different from the other Pixies).

Pow 180
Int 150
Acc 125
Spd 120
Def 140
Lif 125

Char: Up Fire

Good Luck with Diva, but counters are your best friends...especially when they work against Dynast.

By Sandy on Friday, April 4, 2003 - 04:23 pm:

Tapota
188/146/115/119/134/129
Up Fire, Up Water

Imagine my surprise when I found another password to the Diva!

By Infernus on Monday, May 12, 2003 - 03:09 pm:

Password: BOONTUDE
Stats: 185/160/115/115/134/121
